steps.step: Heat oil in a 3-quart saucepan over moderately high heat until hot but not smoking, then brown neck and giblets.
Add remaining ingredients and simmer until reduced to about 4 cups, 45 minutes to 1 hour.
Pour stock through a fine sieve into a bowl. Skim off and discard any fat.
